item.title: Arkhaos Cloud
item.description: The Arkhaos Cloud threatens to turn every living thing into a servant of doom, corrupting their minds and enslaving their wills.

item.title: Eclipses
item.description: In [[Lantemar]], the world revolves around its sun, [[Sunnir]], facing it nearly always. There are seasons in this world, but they have such a small effect that keeping their track is unreasonable.

item.title: Krickee's Guide ter' Stoppin' the Storm
item.description: Well, thar’ be quite a few ways to stop the storm milads. But I’ll be goin’ over the methods most prominently discussed.

item.title: Lantemar
item.description: The known world! Lantemar is what the people call the known reaches of the planetoid they have explored, or Eylant in some more ancient texts.

item.title: Places
item.description: Lant â€“ Physical Plane This realm holds all physical matter. Extraphysical matter does exist outside of this realm, while physical matter can although it does not.

item.title: Plannir
item.description: A magnificent astral body, Plannir is the physical manifestation of the [[Planes]] beyond Lant. Plannir works as a series of orbiting shells, each one containing a plane layered deeper and deeper.

item.title: Sunnir
item.description: Sunnir, or the sun, is the light-giving astral body that [[Lantemar]] orbits. It is said in [[Seerism]] and [[Stalism]] to be a representation of Stalnir’s light.

item.title: Tom's Foolery
item.description: Heyo! Welcome to the Tom’s Foolery Wiki! I’ll be publishing notes to this wiki usually after every session, depending on what you guys have found.
